org.codehaus.aspectwerkz.annotation
Class AnnotationC 

   
    java.lang.Object
   
   
   
    org.codehaus.aspectwerkz.annotation.AnnotationC
   
  
     public class
     
      AnnotationC
extends Object

Annotation compiler.

Extracts the annotations from JavaDoc tags and inserts them into the bytecode of the class.

Author:
Jonas BonŽr , Alexandre Vasseur
